title: EventBridge to Lambda to Bedrock & SNS
description: Create an intelligent AWS Health event notification system with AI-powered analysis using EventBridge, Lambda, Bedrock, and SNS.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to build an intelligent AWS Health event monitoring system that automatically captures health events, analyzes them using AI, and sends enhanced notifications. The solution combines multiple AWS services to provide real-time health event processing with intelligent insights.

When AWS Health events occur, EventBridge automatically captures them based on the configured rule pattern. The Lambda function processes these events and leverages Amazon Bedrock's Claude 3 Haiku model to generate intelligent summaries, impact assessments, and actionable recommendations. The enhanced analysis is then formatted and sent via SNS email notifications.

The AI analysis provides three key insights: a brief summary of the health event, potential impact on your AWS services, and specific recommended actions to take. This transforms basic health notifications into actionable intelligence, helping teams respond more effectively to AWS service issues.

The pattern uses Claude 3 Haiku for cost-effective AI analysis while maintaining high-quality insights. Error handling ensures notifications are still sent even if Bedrock analysis fails, providing system reliability. The solution is designed to be cost-efficient, leveraging AWS Free Tier eligible services where possible.
This pattern deploys one Lambda function, one SNS topic with email subscription, one EventBridge rule, and the necessary IAM permissions for Bedrock access.
